title: Ranked Team to work their way up
body:
Looking for team as an adc/jg main more adc main and Im smurfing at bronze 4 for fun but i would like to start rankin that account up with a fun team but its hard to find teams that i can carry :P
Add me if interested or comment below: 4rtificialalpha

replies.body: yeah we have a 3/4 man team and we don't really have a primary ad carry. interested?

yea man
whats your league name?
first of all we are assorted from bronze 5, to 3. do you mind
Na man idm Just invite me
as long as we win and you have an understanding of the game i dont mind

I know it may be bad to jump in on this but i can play pretty much any lane safely. i just want me some season rewards. i got a gold and silver acc. add "Dangerous K" if you are needing another player
